root.name: Zone 66
root.description: Created by Renaissance and published by Epic MegaGames (now known as Epic Games), the game had players control several aircraft to destroy various targets. Â Taking place in the twenty-second century, the story revolves around an ex-GSA pilot whose hometown is destroyed by a nuclear bomb, which ends up killing his wife and daughter. He seeks revenge after obtaining a fighter plane and the story progresses from there, eventually he finds out who the terrorists are and why they destroyed his hometown.
